column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Are you okay ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " No , I 'm not okay .
#Text=" Zuko says : " More sorry than I 've been about anything in my entire life .
#Text=" Katara says : " Then he 'll forgive you .
#Text=He will .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle ?
#Text=" Aang says : " All these past Avatars .
#Text=They keep telling me I 'm gon na have to do it .
#Text=They do n't get it .
#Text=You 're right .
#Text=Maybe an Air Nomad Avatar will understand where I 'm coming from .
#Text=I know you ca n't really talk .
#Text=Pretending you can just helps me think .
#Text=I 'm going to pretend I did n't pretend to hear that .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " I am Avatar Yangchen , young airbender .
#Text=" Aang says : " Avatar Yangchen , the monks always taught me that all life is sacred .
#Text=Even the life of the tiniest spider - fly caught in its own web .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " Yes .
#Text=All life is sacred .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know , I 'm even a vegetarian .
#Text=I 've always tried to solve my problems by being quick or clever .
#Text=And I 've only had to use violence for necessary defense .
#Text=And I 've certainly never used it to take a life .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " Avatar Aang , I know that you 're a gentle spirit , and the monks have taught you well , but this is n't about you .
#Text=This is about the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " But the monks taught me that I had to detach myself from the world so my spirit could be free .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " Many great and wise Air Nomads have detached themselves and achieved spiritual enlightenment , but the Avatar can never do it .
#Text=Because your sole duty is to the world .
#Text=Here is my wisdom for you : Selfless duty calls you to sacrifice your own spiritual needs , and do whatever it takes to protect the world .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess I do n't have a choice , Momo .
#Text=I have to kill the Fire Lord .
#Text="
